title: Why is it so dang hard to name babies?
body: My wife and I are expecting and we are struggling to pick out a good name for our soon to be baby boy. My wife has the "if I know someone with that name it is a no go" syndrome. That being said I am just asking for name suggestions, anything from completely normal to very odd. Just hit me with some suggestions, the only stipulation I have is that the name can not end in the letter N due to conflicting pronunciations with my last name. Sorry for being difficult but thats why we are in this mess, thanks for any replies :).
